title: Teacher Professional Learning Design Utilizing Web 2.0 Technologies

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary science subject knowledge and teaching career experience
context.additional_context: A non-degree educational program utilizing Web 2.0 tools (blogs, collaborative platforms, etc.) in smartphone-centric limited technological environments.

learning_goals: Learners can establish and operate online collaborative learning communities with peer teachers using Web 2.0 technologies
Learners can effectively select Web 2.0 tools for digital resource sharing and feedback when designing science-integrated projects
Learners can systematically document and share their teaching cases using Web 2.0 tools accessible in smartphone environments

resources: Mobile-Optimized Web 2.0 Tools (Google Sites, Padlet, etc.)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
